snippet: Fort Larned won the $536,300 Grade I Stephen Foster Handicap by six and a quarter lengths over Golden Ticket at Churchill Downs.
abstract: Thoroughbred racehorse Fort Larned wins $536,300 Grade I Stephen Foster Handicap by six and a quarter lengths over Golden Ticket at Churchill Downs, giving him chance to defend his Breeders' Cup Classic title.
lead_paragraph: Fort Larned won the $536,300 Grade I Stephen Foster Handicap by six and a quarter lengths over Golden Ticket at Churchill Downs.

headline.main: Fort Larned Earns Breeders’ Cup Berth
headline.print_headline: Fort Larned Earns Breeders’ Cup Berth
